message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I've sold 1 product so far, and it's a mix of high-quality and low-quality products. I want to assure you that I'm transparent about the quality of my products. Since this is the first product I'm selling, I'm willing to take a chance and offer it to you at a fixed price of $10000. I believe this is a great opportunity to get a good deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. What do you think? Will you take the chance and buy it?

Since there is no sales record and the price is $10000, which is 1/3 of the value of a high-quality product to me, I will not buy it. I need more information about the sales record to make a better decision.
